DBN Television bu ụlọọrụ nke Maazị Osa Sonny Adun guzobere na Naịjirịa na 1986
Ọ malitere mgbasa ozi ya na 1995 otu afọ tupu Gọọmentị Naịjirị ewepụ usoro mgbasa ozi.
DBN malitere mgbasa ozi na 1995 dị ka ụlọ ọrụ onwe onye site n'aka onye ọrụ mgbasa ozi a maara nke a na-akpọ Mr Osa Sonny Adun. Ọ malitere ọrụ na Lagos ma mesịa nwee ọrụ na Abuja.
E kenyere ọwa ahụ ugboro ugboro na UHF (Channel 32)
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Commonwealth Broadcasting Association (CBA), Africa Union of Broadcasters (AUB) na Broadcasting Organization of Nigeria (BON)
DBN na-agbasa ozi na Satellite TV Startimes na channel 124.
